text: Business Management Training College is a South African college established in 1973 in association with the Institute of Business Management. In the three decades that it has been in operation, the college has trained more than 100,000 students. Tuition is currently by distance education only. ==Ranking== ==External links== *Official Site Category:Distance education institutions based in South Africa Category:Educational institutions established in 1973 Category:1973 establishments in South Africa
title: Business Management Training College
